headline: New Illuminating Company Power Line to Improve Reliability for Avon Lake Customers
summary: The Illuminating Company, a subsidiary of FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE), is constructing a new neighborhood power line that will help enhance electric service reliability for hundreds of customers in Lorain County, particularly during severe weather.

raw.headline: New Illuminating Company Power Line to Improve Reliability for Avon Lake Customers

headline: Grid Upgrades Underway to Benefit JCP&L Customers in Burlington and Ocean Counties
summary: Jersey Central Power & Light (JCP&L), a subsidiary of FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE), has started upgrades to the electric grid in Burlington and northwestern Ocean counties to enhance service for approximately 2,500 JCP&L customers. The $3.2 million, two-phase project is expected to be completed in July.
